channel.title: Adding player options to a framework [317 - Pheonix Source]
channel.description:
Ok so I'm having trouble actually like making the "Follow" and "Trade" options to show up when you right click a player. It shows the "Walk here" option but the others won't/don't show up. If you didn't know this source is strictly based off of 317 Protocol. If you can help me or point me in the right direction please do.
-Thanks in advance to whoever.
